design projects

Thesaurus application

about

Thesaurus application is a web based dictionary which not only allows to search or modify the data but also to extract terminology and find related terms within documents. As it is a project with continuous development, there are more possible features which can be added in the future, therefore, the whole application was created as a module based system, making the maintenance of back-end and also front-end easy.

developed for

Natural Language Processing Centre

contribution

design, front-end

technologies used

JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, XSL, HTML5, CSS3

design & code by lucyia
